name: Charlie Choice: Breaking out of Camp
name_original: Charlie Choice: Breaking out of Camp
description:
Charlie Choice is a stickman that needs your help!

He's trapped in a maximum security prison called Snowy Valleys Prison, where the most dangerous prisoners are kept. Will you break out and see sunlight again? Let's Find out. This game was made in Clickteam Fusion 2.5

Fail! Acheive! Escape! In this game do anything you can to escape the prison camp.

Inspired by Henry Stickmin Collection and Puffballs United. Some music in game is taken from their game so credit to them.

The Demo is out now. VERY short, don't expect it to be big.
